ud8.10:12.2: Chaṭṭhamavaggavaranti → chaṭṭhamavaggavaraṃ (bj, mr), jaccandho → tu tamandho (mr)
ud8.10:12.4: Pāṭaligāmiyamaṭṭhamavaggo → pāṭaligāmavaraṭṭhamavaggo (bj, mr) | pāṭaligāmiyavaraṭṭhamavaggo (s1-3, km, pts1)
ud8.10:13.4: Addhā hi taṃ udānamitīdamāhu → addhā tamudānamitīdamāhu (bj) | saddhā hi taṃ udānantidamāhu (s1-3, km, pts1) | atthāyetaṃ udānamitimāhu (mr)
